title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama—install from PyPI and chat with local models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama—works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers via npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode) installable via Docker.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart that deploys Ollama server and models to Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper written in Go that adds conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model; configurable roles and rate limits.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java / Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that pipes Copilot-style suggestions from a local Ollama model directly in the editor.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama server and CLI, enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline, with model download manager.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama chat & embed endpoints for MCP-enabled IDEs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate offering async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that replies in threads using any Ollama model, deployable on Fly.io in one click.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an “Ask Ollama” command to summarize notes or brainstorm inside your vault.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Unofficial Elixir client wrapping Ollama API with GenServer-based process management for chats.
